Class ReportController

java.lang.Object
controller.ReportController
public class ReportController extends Object
Controller for generating various reports for the BTO Management System.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ReportController(ApplicationDB applicationDB, ProjectDB projectDB, UserDB userDB)
    Constructs a new ReportController with references to all necessary databases.

      public ReportController(ApplicationDB applicationDB, ProjectDB projectDB, UserDB userDB)
      Constructs a new ReportController with references to all necessary databases.
      Parameters:
      applicationDB - The application database
      projectDB - The project database
      userDB - The user database

  • Method Details

    • generateBookingReport

      public List<FlatBooking> generateBookingReport(String projectName, FlatType flatType, MaritalStatus maritalStatus, Integer minAge, Integer maxAge)
      Generates a report of flat bookings filtered by various criteria.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project (optional)
      flatType - The type of flat (optional)
      maritalStatus - The marital status to filter by (optional)
      minAge - The minimum age to filter by (optional)
      maxAge - The maximum age to filter by (optional)
      Returns:
      A list of bookings matching the criteria

    • generateApplicationSummaryReport

      public Map<String,Integer> generateApplicationSummaryReport()
      Generates a summary report of applications for all projects.
      Returns:
      A map of project names to application counts

    • generateApplicationDetailReport

      public Map<ApplicationStatus, Integer> generateApplicationDetailReport(String projectName)
      Generates a detailed report of applications for a specific project.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project
      Returns:
      A map of application statuses to counts

    • generateFlatTypePreferenceReport

      public Map<MaritalStatus, Map<FlatType,Integer>> generateFlatTypePreferenceReport()
      Generates a report of flat type preferences by marital status.
      Returns:
      A nested map of marital statuses to flat types to counts

    • generateAgeGroupSuccessReport

      public Map<String,Double> generateAgeGroupSuccessReport(int[] ageGroups)
      Generates a report of application success rates by age group.
      Parameters:
      ageGroups - An array of age boundaries for grouping
      Returns:
      A map of age group strings to success rates

    • generateRemainingUnitsReport

      public Map<String, Map<FlatType,Integer>> generateRemainingUnitsReport()
      Generates a report of remaining units by project and flat type.
      Returns:
      A nested map of project names to flat types to remaining units

    • generateOfficerPerformanceReport

      public Map<String,Integer> generateOfficerPerformanceReport()
      Generates a report of officer performance by number of bookings processed.
      Returns:
      A map of officer NRICs to booking counts

    • generateBookingDetailsTextReport

      public String generateBookingDetailsTextReport(String projectName)
      Generates a text report of booking details for a specific project.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project
      Returns:
      A formatted string report

    • generateSystemSummaryReport

      public String generateSystemSummaryReport()
      Generates a summary text report of applications and bookings for all projects.
      Returns:
      A formatted string report
